boone.spike

Class SpikeEventBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractQueue<E>
        • java.util.concurrent.PriorityBlockingQueue<SpikeEvent>
          • boone.spike.SpikeEventQueue
            • boone.spike.SpikeEventBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<SpikeEvent>, java.util.Collection<SpikeEvent>, java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<SpikeEvent>, java.util.Queue<SpikeEvent>

    public class SpikeEventBuffer
extends SpikeEventQueue
    The global buffer in a SpikingNeuralNet that holds the events generated by the neurons and links inside the network.
    Version:
    $Id: EventBuffer.java 2286 2015-08-04 jmory $
    Author:
    Johannes Mory
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Create a new SpikeEventBuffer, with the specified horizon.

        public void clear()
